title: API Academy Admission: How the Web Works
description: To unlock the chest of knowledge for House Lovelace, you must learn some basics about the worldwide web.

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: What four letter acronym describes the most common protocol used by web clients (like your browser) and web servers to transfer data on the web, like HTML or images?

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: Sometimes a client computer needs to send additional information when it requests a web page or other resource from a server (like state that needs to persist across requests, such as "cookies"). What are these extra bits of information called?
